entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #59606
  • Enumerable.Select/Where should guarantee the order of results #59599
  • Use pipeline caching feature of AzDo in CI #59598
  • Eliminate allocations when enumerating empty collections #59596
  • Different struct layout with object and nint fields #59593
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Zstandard to System.IO.Compression #59591

Closed

  • Using delegate*<void*, uint> instead of a managed delegate in Win32 CreateThread crashes the runtime. #59605
  • Tasks issues on Mac Catalyst #52460
    7.0.0
  • Kerberos authentication not work on .NET 6 RC1 with official docker images #59518
    6.0.0
  • The asp.net core program is deployed on a win7 computer, and an error “The type initializer for 'System.DateTime' threw an exception” is reported when running #59594
  • object initializer for struct does unnecessary processing. #59515

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386598 #59609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove invalid test exclusions. #59608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Improve Makefile's dotnet.js dependencies #59603
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    * NO MERGE *, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386324 #59601
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Backport from `release/6.0-rc2`: MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, a… #59597
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing pinvoke fixes #59595
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1385667 #59592
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Fix PlatformDetection.IsMonoInterpreter for mobile #59587
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add checking SpeechRecognitionEngine Culture to GrammarBuilder test #59516
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Change loop cloning condition blocks flow graph #59233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload - Provide a way to suppress rude edit dialog #21412
  • Enable implicit RID with `--sc` #21405
  • How to test .NET on macOS Arm64 #21404
  • Cannot get a .NET Core 3.1 app to run on .NET 6 with `dotnet run` on macos-arm64 #21401

Closed

  • High CPU usage from dotnet CLI with 6.0-RC1 builds #21028

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1386001 #21411
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385830 #21407
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385782 #21406
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1385519 #21400
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetDocumentationCommentXml sometimes has no root element #56733

Closed

  • dotnet build --no-resotre CSC : error CS8034 #56342
    Backlog
  • IDE0084 Use pattern matching (IsNot operator) - dangerous for "Not TypeOf..." syntax #55607
    Backlog
  • IDE0052 suggests changes that would break the desired behavior of some programs #56666
  • Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #56607
    17.0
  • Change Signature crashes if the signature is not valid #56495
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Report correct severity for Hot Reload rude edits #56734
    Area-Interactive, 17.0
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs UX Triage
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56732
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56730
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56731
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56724
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set the width of Inheritance Margin to 18 #56709
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56694
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56726
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Filter out results from progression/lsp with docs that we can't get uris for #56700
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56725
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage

Updated

  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs UX Triage
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Target interactive host and tests to net6.0 #56705
    Area-Interactive
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • Add CallerArgumentExpression to VB language feature status doc #55230
    Area-Compilers
  • MSBuildWorkspace Add Reload Apis #52554
    Area-IDE
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider releasing a supported version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.MultipartBundle #36978
  • .Net 6 RC1 - Cannot set reponse headers in ExceptionMiddleware returning IAsyncEnumerable in controller #36977
  • Overwriting RenderTreeFrame within RenderTreeBuilder for a Markdown blazor component #36976
  • Startup improvement: caching, json #36975
  • Startup regression: updates #36974
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #36973
  • User's secrets are not used in the new templates in Net 6 RC1 #36971
  • How to reference ProblemDetails in Blazor "shared" project? #36970
  • Blazor - support variable height container in Virtualize component #36969
  • The PageTitle component doesn't update the title when navigating directly to a page #36967
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery doesn't work in non-routable components #36966
  • Single file build time regression: plaintext #36964
  • Perf regression: plaintext_actix, updates #36962
  • Brotli compression + disable response buffering for plain text yields incorrect response body #36960

Closed

  • Unhandled exception in c++ client's hub_connection::stop() method due to cancellation logic #35515
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: https #36942
  • Startup regression: https #36963
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, single_query #36961
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Protocol.JsonHubProtocol' threw an exception. #36965
  • [Discussion] Actions returning IAsyncEnumerable<> are no longer buffered by MVC when using System.Text.Json #32483
    Discussions
  • Improve Razor Formatting Perf #31542
    17.0-Preview5
  • Can we remove the MapToDocumentEdits call in Razor On Type formatting? #36319
    17.0-Preview5

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36972
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36959
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix BoundAttributDescriptor.GetHashCode and add test (#36679) #36956
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Fix alpine queue used for Helix #36939
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Go back to alpine 3.12 #36951
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • Include system crash dumps in artifacts #36824
    area-infrastructure
  • Add MapPatch API to endpointRouteBuilderExtensions #36818
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • http logging log level enhancement #36873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Use TryParse and BindAsync methods from interfaces #36955
